mapper.sql: _stock.id, _stock.publish_time publishTime, _stock.status, _rank.sh_open_exponent shOpenExponent, _stock.sh_close_exponent shCloseExponent, _stock.sh_max_exponent shMaxExponent, _stock.sh_min_exponent shMinExponent, _stock.tb_open_exponent tbOpenExponent, _stock.tb_close_exponent tbCloseExponent, _stock.tb_max_exponent tbMaxExponent, _stock.tb_min_exponent tbMinExponent, _stock.create_time createTime, _stock.create_user_id createUserId, _stock.update_time updateTime, _stock.update_user_id updateUserId
mapper.insert: insert into (id, publish_time, status, sh_open_exponent, sh_close_exponent, sh_max_exponent, sh_min_exponent, tb_open_exponent, tb_close_exponent, tb_max_exponent, tb_min_exponent, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id) values (#{id}, #{publishTime}, #{status}, #{shOpenExponent}, #{shCloseExponent}, #{shMaxExponent}, #{shMinExponent}, #{tbOpenExponent}, #{tbCloseExponent}, #{tbMaxExponent}, #{tbMinExponent}, #{createTime}, #{createUserId}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUserId})

id,
publish_time,

mapper.update:
update
publish_time = #{publishTime},
status = #{status},
sh_open_exponent = #{shOpenExponent},
sh_close_exponent = #{shCloseExponent},
sh_max_exponent = #{shMaxExponent},
sh_min_exponent = #{shMinExponent},
tb_open_exponent = #{tbOpenExponent},
tb_close_exponent = #{tbCloseExponent},
tb_max_exponent = #{tbMaxExponent},
tb_min_exponent = #{tbMinExponent},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user_id = #{createUserId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update set publish_time = #{publishTime}, status = #{status}, sh_open_exponent = #{shOpenExponent}, sh_close_exponent = #{shCloseExponent}, sh_max_exponent = #{shMaxExponent}, sh_min_exponent = #{shMinExponent}, tb_open_exponent = #{tbOpenExponent}, tb_close_exponent = #{tbCloseExponent}, tb_max_exponent = #{tbMaxExponent}, tb_min_exponent = #{tbMinExponent}, create_time = #{createTime}, create_user_id = #{createUserId}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from _stock where _stock.status = 0 order by _stock.publish_time desc
select from (select * from stock_ where stock_.status = 0 order by stock_.publish_time desc limit #{num}) as _stock where _stock.status = 0 order by _stock.publish_time
